OOC she could have run inside the forest... enought to lost the way 
to come back

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: They moved that far? The Hero had wandered a bit away from the 
base, at least 50 feet...
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: airly2000@y... 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Friday, May 11, 2001 12:44 AM
>   Subject: RE: Chivtrons...
> 
> 
>     Trinity/Nightlight/Windlord:
> 
>     Trinity ran and tripped with something and she looked carefully 
and scream scared "AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!"
> 
>     She ran away scared, TRinity had seen Hero's remains.
> 
>     Nightlight heard Trinity's scream and she followed it then she 
found Hero's remain and tembled, whoever had done it could be around 
and Trinity was in danger, she opened her comm link and 
said "Aerotaur, Windlord... come... It's Hero..."
> 
>     Windlord received the comm link and followed the signal
